Articles.Content:
Hi fellow rocket surgeons!

I just got KSP a few days ago, and have been pretty much playing non-stop.

And when I'm not playing, I'm browsing these forums, looking at all this awesome stuff, such as the mods, map projects, etc...

my question is, how can I help contribute to the community? I can't do anything at all coding or programming related, and I wish I could map stuff, but it seems to have already been mapped.

Any suggestions?

If you hang around a while I'm sure you'll spot something everyone else has missed but would find exciting.

What about coming up with a good challenge?

You can always help by spreading the word and encouraging people to buy the program.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
